scripts.start: gulp css && concurrently --kill-others --handle-input "cd theme && vtex link --verbose" "gulp watch" -n "vtex,gulp" -c "magenta,cyan"
scripts.checkout: gulp css && concurrently --kill-others --handle-input "cd checkout-ui-settings && vtex link --verbose" "gulp watch" -n "vtex,gulp" -c "magenta,cyan"
scripts.vrm: gulp css && cd theme && vtex release minor stable --verbose
scripts.vrp: gulp css && cd theme && vtex release patch stable --verbose
scripts.vms: gulp css && cd theme && vtex release major stable --verbose
scripts.vprom: cd theme && vtex use prod --production --verbose && vtex install --verbose && vtex promote --verbose
scripts.vvin: cd theme && vtex use validacao && vtex install --verbose && cd ..
scripts.vtex:base: vtex install --verbose vtex.admin-graphql-ide vtex.admin-mercadolivre-opportunities vtex.admin-pages vtex.admin-search vtex.admin-users vtex.app-install-monitor vtex.asset-server vtex.audit-io vtex.auth-server vtex.billing vtex.broadcaster vtex.cartman vtex.checkout vtex.colossus-legacy-proxy vtex.developer-docs-integration vtex.dotnet-messenger-sender vtex.evolution-manager-graphql vtex.invoice-notifier vtex.marketplace-network vtex.messages-templates vtex.messenger-core vtex.my-account vtex.notification-generator vtex.orders-broadcast vtex.pix-payment vtex.request-capture vtex.rewriter vtex.search-resolver vtex.seller-provisioner vtex.seller-welcome vtex.sms-messenger-sender vtex.smtp-messenger-sender vtex.sse-server vtex.store vtex.store-sitemap vtex.toolbelt-telemetry vtex.transform-handlebars-email vtex.transform-handlebars-sms vtex.transform-render-email vtex.transform-render-sms vtex.ab-tester@0.x vtex.admin-cms@0.x vtex.admin-cms-graphql@0.xvtex.admin-cms-graphql-rc@0.x vtex.admin-graphql-ide@3.x vtex.admin-search@1.x vtex.admin-subscriptions@1.x vtex.app-store-seller@0.x vtex.badges@3.x vtex.search@2.x vtex.console@0.x vtex.google-tag-manager@2.x vtex.my-credits@1.x vtex.my-subscriptions@3.x vtex.search@2.x vtex.search-resolver@2.x vtex.store-indexer@0.x
scripts.vtex:deps: vtex install --verbose allegralar.trustvox-integration@1.x allegralar.any-page-breadcrumb@0.x vtexeurope.minicart-freeshipping-bar@2.x vtex.disposition-layout@3.x vtex.mega-menu@2.x vtex.wish-list@1.x vtex.reviews-and-ratings@3.x vtex.store-locator@0.x vtex.quickorder@3.x vtex.availability-notify@1.x vtex.checkout-ui-custom
